about_the_game:
Fruit n Meat is a charming auto-battler where you defend your garden from whimsical sky invaders! Strategically arrange adorable fruit warriors with unique abilities and watch them spring to life in delightful hand-drawn animations. Use clever tactics to summon your fruity army and fend off relentless foes. Will you protect your garden from chaos? Dive in for juicy battles and endless fun!

Features:
  • Dynamic Card Collection: Dive into an exciting array of cards to summon a colourful roster of fruit warriors, each with unique strengths to help you defend your garden!
  • Powerful Skill Cards: Enhance your strategy with an impressive selection of skill cards, empowering your units and unleashing devastating combos on your foes!
  • Challenging Enemy Waves: Stand your ground against relentless waves of whimsical invaders, each more cunning than the last. Will your tactics hold up under pressure?
  • Thrilling Boss Battles: Face off against epic bosses that will test your strategy and resolve. Outmaneuver these giant foes to secure your garden’s safety and glory!
